name: VideoDetective
0:
”Alexa, ask video detective to investigate "Black Panther"”
”Alexa, ask video detective to stake out ''This Is Us"”
”alexa, ask video detective to profile "Tom Hanks"”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: video detective
des:
Video Detective is the original entertainment search engine. 
First, ask Video Detective to "investigate" a movie or "stake out" a TV show or "profile" performer or director. 
It will list the most likely suspects. 
You can then ask it to select the one you want to learn more about. Video Detective will then tell you what it knows including when and where something is available
 
The Video Detective skill is growing so check back for more capabilities….coming soon:
Creating a watch list. 
Reminders.
Tracking what you’ve watched.
Rating movies and shows you’ve watched.
Viewing trailers on your phone, tablet, computer or smart TV.
Reviews and ratings.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
